authProvider.description: The provider used to authenticate the user, e.g. google, github, etc.

clientToken.description: The token provided by the external provider

email.description: The email address of the user

externalUserId.description: The ID of the user from the external provider

externalUserName.description: The username of the user from the external provider

image.description: The image URL of the user from the external provider

org_id.description: the organization id for the sso connection
